basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.name: Name
basicInfo.nameValue: Katou Megumi (かとう めぐみ)

introduction.title: Character Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: Katou Megumi is the heroine of "Saenai Heroine no Sodatekata", a seemingly ordinary yet charming girl. She possesses a unique "background character" attribute, able to perfectly hide her presence in crowds, but it is precisely this ordinariness that contains extraordinary charm.
introduction.paragraph2: Megumi has a gentle and kind personality, always able to understand others' thoughts and provide appropriate support and encouragement. Although she appears plain, she actually possesses keen insight and a strong heart. In her interactions with Aki Tomoya and others, she gradually reveals her unique charm and importance.
introduction.paragraph3: Katou Megumi represents a kind of genuine and simple beauty. She doesn't need gorgeous appearance or special talents; her mere existence is enough to warm hearts and become an indispensable presence in others' lives.

footer.dedication: Dedicated to the cutest Katou Megumi ♡
